thread.title: Rooms in the back of the hotel are a bit noisy
thread.title_full: Rooms in the back of the hotel are a bit noisy - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Simpleguy22
title: Rooms in the back of the hotel are a bit noisy
text: I stay here at least two to three times a year. This time I was on the third floor, the Hilton Honors floor, but was in the back in the high number rooms. There is a lot of street noise that can be heard from the room. I'll still choose to stay here. Hopefully next time I'll get a lower number room.
